mapper.select: SELECT match_id, user1_id, user2_id, created_at, status FROM match_user WHERE user1_id = LEAST(#{user1Id}, #{user2Id}) AND user2_id = GREATEST(#{user1Id}, #{user2Id})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO match_user (user1_id, user2_id, created_at, status) VALUES (LEAST(#{user1Id}, #{user2Id}), GREATEST(#{user1Id}, #{user2Id}), #{createdAt}, #{status})
